definitions.text: any person in the armed services who holds a position of authority or command
examples: an officer is responsible for the lives of his men

definitions.text: someone who is appointed or elected to an office and who holds a position of trust
examples: he is an officer of the court
the club elected its officers for the coming year

definitions.text: a member of a police force
a person authorized to serve in a position of authority on a vessel
examples: he is the officer in charge of the ship's engines

definitions.text: direct or command as an officer
